name: 2013 Louisville Slugger Z2000 SB13ZAE Slowpitch ASA Softball Bat ENDLOAD
description:

• LS-2X composite
• iST technology
• S1iD technology
• End load swing weight
• Synthetic grip, 7/8" standard handle
• 12" barrel
• USSSA, NSA, ISF, ISA, ASA approved

name: 2012-2013 USSSA Easton Synergy SP12SY100W Wegman Softball Slowpitch Bat
description:
2012-2013 USSSA Easton Synergy SP12SY100W Brian Wegman Softball Slowpitch Bat 34/28 oz

Product Description:
The all new Brian Wegman Pro Model has a 12" pro-style end-loaded barrel for maximum power. Single System Composite Design increases bat control. Black Carbon composite handle improves feel and reduces vibration. IMX™ Composite barrel optimizes the sweet spot for maximum performance. Ultra thin 29/32" handle with performance diamond grip. Extreme 100+ MPH performance. Complies with current Bat Performance Standards - USSSA, NSA, ISA, SSUSA, ISF.

Specifications:

12" pro-style end-loaded barrel

Single System Composite Design

Black Carbon composite handle

IMX Composite barrel

Ultra thin 29/32" handle

Extreme 100+ MPH performance

Approved for play in USSSA for 2012 and Beyond. 

Includes new 1.20 Fingerprint Stamp!

Sizes: 34/28 oz

name: 2010 NIW Easton Synergy Speed SRV3 Brett Helmer BH Signature Edition ASA Bat
description:
2010 Easton Synergy Speed SRV3 ASA Softball Bat 34/26 oz 

BAT HAS 2004 ASA STAMP AND 2013 USSSA 120 CERTIFICATION 
 
Designed for power hitters, SRV3 Synergy Speed Slowpitch Softball Bat is a composite bat that brings together Focused Flex Handle technology for power, with a Single System one-piece barrel for balance, and patented Integrated Matrix Technology for strength and reduced vibration. The Easton SRV2 Synergy Speed bat offers an extended hitting area and optimal swing weight with a slightly end-loaded, 12-inch, multi-wall barrel. Laser Precision Manufacturing provides a lighter moment of inertia for faster, 98 mile per hour and higher swing speeds while Carbon Nantucket Technology increases the bat's durability. The Easton SRV3 Synergy Speed Slowpitch Bat meets all ASA, USSSA, NSA, ISA, ISF and SSUSA Bat Performance Standards.
 
Easton Synergy Speed BH Softball Bat Slowpitch 12" Barrel SRV3 ASA

+ Easton Synergy Speed BH 12" Slow-Pitch Softball Bat
+ Slightly end loaded for increased power
+ 12" barrel length
+ 2 1/4" diameter barrel
+ EASTON’s Focused Flex handle technology increases power
+ VRS provides solid feel and the elimination of vibration for ultimate comfort
+ Patented IMX technology - the best in materials, design and manufacturing process of any softball bat
+ Meets all 2009 Bat Performance Standards – ASA, USSSA, NSA, ISA, ISF and SSUSA
+ 98MPH performance

name: 2011 Louisville Slugger TPS Z-1000 Slowpitch Softball Bat ASA SB11Z
description:
2011 Louisville Slugger TPS Z-1000 Slowpitch Softball Bat ASA SB11Z

iST composite
While maintaining handle stiffness, iST joins the barrel and handle together, providing players with great solid feel and larger sweet spot. iST features a solid connection between the handle and barrel, giving players maximum performance - even on inside hits.

S1iD
Enjoy maximum performance from SWING 1. No more frustrating break-in period. S1iD Technology allows you to enjoy maximum performance right out of the wrapper.

Features:

 •iST composite design
•S1iD barrel technology
•Balanced swing weight
•Synthetic grip, 7/8" standard handle
•12" barrel
•USSSA, NSA, ISF, ISA, ASA approved

name: 2012-2013 Easton SP12SY98H Synergy 98H Helmer ASA Slowpitch Softball Bat
description:
Introducing the new 2012-2013 Easton SP12SY98H Synergy 98H Helmer ASA Slowpitch Softball Bat Pro Model. The Single System Composite construction on this bat is nothing short of amazing. The 12" pro-style end-loaded barrel was designed for maximum power, optimized sweet spot, and maximum performance. The design uses Easton's Integrated Matrix technology on the barrel and is equipped with Easton's new Black Carbon Composite handle, which improves feel and reduces vibration. 

The Easton Synergy 98H has a 98 MPH performance rating and complies with all the current Bat Performance Standards listed below.

Features: 
•12" pro-style end-loaded barrel for maximum power 
•Single System Composite Design increases bat control 
•Black Carbon composite handle improves feel and reduces vibration 
•IMX Composite barrel optimizes the sweet spot for maximum performance 
•Ultra thin 29/32" handle with performance diamond grip 
•98 MPH performance; complies with all current Bat Performance Standards - ASA, USSSA, NSA, ISF, ISA, SSUSA
